website_summaries.verdict: A gigantic, sturdy and stable towing tube that riders of all ages will enjoy.
pros: Fun to ride at fast or slow speeds
Very stable, with few flip-overs during use
Easily fits up to 3 adults or kids, or 1 adult stretched out
Sturdy backrest that doubles as a chariot wall when rear tow connection is used
cons: Inner and outer tubes aren’t connected, so inflation valves can retract into the tube when deflated and are hard to locate
Can develop slow leak after a couple seasons of use

customer_reviews.title: Everyone loves it!
customer_reviews.text: This thing is awesome!! A hit with the kids under 10, teenagers, and the kids over 50. Everyone has a blast on this thing and everyone at the lake talks about it. We even spun it around like a chariot and it was wild. We spend the money and got the inflatable ball to keep the line drag out of the water since we are towing from a fishing boat. So. Much. Fun.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs S

customer_reviews.title: FUN In The Sun!
customer_reviews.text: We pulled our teen boys around for a few hours hooked up to a jet ski the first day we used Big Mable. Of course, they declared Mable to be the most fun thing they ever did at our cottage. The kids got pulled around for 3 days over the weekend and float was easy to get in and out of the water in front of our cottage with 2 teens carrying it. We purchased a 50' ski rope but will switch to a 60'. FUN!!
customer_reviews.author: JH

customer_reviews.title: Big kids and adults even love it!
customer_reviews.text: Kids got teenaged and I thought tubing days were gone. Bought this and they all love it. Adults do too. After one season we are still thrilled. Two suggestions. One - be sure the riders lean back, especially at the beginning and end of the ride. Second - put it inside when not in use. The sun and water rotted the straps on my old from a different maker after several seasons in the sun.
customer_reviews.author: Woodrow

customer_reviews.title: We Love Mable
customer_reviews.text: This is our second Big Mable. The first lasted for YEARS and could still be repaired if the company wasn't constantly backordered on common inflatable parts. We find that Big Mable is plenty big enough to pull two-three teens (including full grown males) without issue and is fun to use both forward and rear facing (chariot style). We have a number of tubes, wakeboards, skis, etc. and time and again we find Big Mable is the one we use the most on the lake. Great for all ages from the little ones tucked in safe to teens and adults looking for a thrill.
customer_reviews.author: Life Out Loud

customer_reviews.title: Grandkids love it but its a little large for my 185 ...
customer_reviews.text: Grandkids love it but its a little large for my 185 open bow. I suggest something a little smaller unless you got a larger boat. I can pull it ok with my 4.3 liter, even with 3 teenage boys on board. BUT, better watch if it gets turned over, it can scoop under water and almost swamp your boat if your in a turn. 20-25 mph max......
customer_reviews.author: gm2015

customer_reviews.title: Double Rider perfect size for all.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great ride. We got it because the grandkids were getting bigger and outgrowing the single tube. We bought the Big Mable Double Rider. Their ages are 8 to 13 and they love it. Their parents are having fun with it also. We have a pontoon boat with a 100 horsepower motor that pulls the double rider without any problem.
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous

customer_reviews.title: Big Mable for the win!
customer_reviews.text: I bought a cheaper towable thinking they were all the same. We took it once and had 2 crying kids and I had to make a visit to the chiropractor. We decided to get a Mable and we are so glad we did! It made a world of difference! It was so comfortable and the kids felt safe. They loved it and can't wait to go more. I can't speak for durability because we have only used once, but it has already been well worth it. ** I'm one of the kids and I love it. I think it feels like I could take a nap on it. -L(9)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: ours wouldn't hold air well kept diving under water in both positions chariot & up right we wanted one for so long very disappointed sent back
customer_reviews.text: do your homework read reviews. ours wouldn't hold air well kept diving under water in both positions chariot & up right we wanted one for so long very disappointed sent back .
customer_reviews.author: babycakes

customer_reviews.title: It's HUGE, you can't control it & it deflates as you use it
customer_reviews.text: This thing is really massive. I had to strap it down to the swim platform on my boat & the back half floated on the water. We had 2 men on it, about 450lbs & it handled great. It doesn't "glide" - you can't shift it from one side of the wake to the other yourself. It goes wherever the boat takes it. So it's not as nimble or fun as a small tube with more control, but the kids & adults all enjoyed it. It will deflate over the course of the day. You can re-inflate it with your mouth though, as it doesn't deflate completely (which would be way too much to do by mouth).
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Parsons

customer_reviews.title: Need quick connect on both ends
customer_reviews.text: Our family has fun with this inflatable/towable. The only reasons I didn't rate it as 5-star are: 1) there should be a quick connect on both sides, and 2) with larger people, they can kick open the air valve and then water can get into the liner and the cover. It's really difficult to get the water drained out after since the inflatable gets too heavy for one person to lift.
customer_reviews.author: Sheri

customer_reviews.title: Fun, but hard to keep inflated.
customer_reviews.text: I've owned a "Great Big Mable", a "Super Mable", and now 2 "Big Mable"s. The first two lasted an entire season, but at about $300 each, they didn't provide good value. This season, I bought a "Big Mable". It popped out it's plug on the first usage, then it had a leak in a seam on the second usage. I was told by a Sportsstuff employee to seal it with Aquaseal, and that worked well. However, another leak appeared just 8" to the left of the first one on the same seam on the third usage. That suggests that something in the material caused it. Now its developed a rise in the middle after 5 usages!
customer_reviews.author: FDW

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for any size!
customer_reviews.text: We took this out on Lake Powell and had a blast! You can go slow for scared riders or fast. One person went on who was very big and it pulled that person sooo well! They loved it! It pulls two great, too! Well balanced and a fun smooth ride. It held up great! Still looks new, easy to get on compared to a tube. Tubes are no fun compared to this. When this one dies, hopefully not for many years, we will buy it again. Lots of smiles and laughs and great times on Big Mable! Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best bang and most fun for your buck!
customer_reviews.text: After much research, this tube came highly rated. We’ve only used it once since we’ve had it but it was a blast! We pulled it behind a pontoon boat and I (mom) rode in between my 3 year old and 6 year old! Plenty of handles to grab on to. Grandpa drove very safe but was really able to whip us around. We felt the thrill but for my littles, I felt it was fun and safe. We are looking forward to trying it out backwards next time. I really like how the bottom is filled with air and it is a smooth ride even on bumpy wakes.
customer_reviews.author: Kari Klev

customer_reviews.title: Bladder fills up with water upon 1st use.
customer_reviews.text: 1 week of vacation on the lake and this towable is unusable. On the 1st use, the bladder filled up with water. The Velcro flaps to cover the inflatable valves are useless. I ensured the valves are closed. I think the valves are possibly mis-shapen and are blown open with the force of water. We are so disappointed and just want a towable that works.
customer_reviews.author: Valerie

customer_reviews.title: Amazing fun
customer_reviews.text: So, I have taken this out once so far, but man, what a great investment in fun. Being able to be towed forwards or backwards is an amazing adaptation. I can tell you from experience though, it is a lot harder to stay on when being towed backwards. So, if you are like me, and think that being thrown from the tube is half the fun, that is the way you will want to ride it! If you just want the tube ride without (a large) probability of being thrown off, then towing it forward is the way to go. It even made for a comfortable lounger when at anchor.
customer_reviews.author: Lyssa Graves

customer_reviews.title: Love Big Mable
customer_reviews.text: This is our second Big Mable!! Our first one we had for 5 or 6 years and we wore her out!! The grandkids love it, especially the little ones who normally would be too scared to tube!! This sets up high enough out of the water, that they will ride with the bigger kids slow and have a great time!!!
customer_reviews.author: Diane L. Gore

customer_reviews.title: We've enjoyed this so far at the lake
customer_reviews.text: We've enjoyed this so far at the lake. Only issue we've encountered is that after riding for awhile the valves come open while riders are still on it. Happened on the bottom part and then on the top with different riders and we had to pull it in and re-inflate on the boat after draining the water out. But it was a major hit because our smaller kids could ride. My toddler even fell asleep on it!
customer_reviews.author: kcm221

customer_reviews.title: Bad ass tube
customer_reviews.text: if you are considering this tube just save the time and buy it. Wont be disappointed at all, having always owned a conventional round tube i kicked around buying this for too long, after seeing many of these at the lake finally pulled the trigger. Super stable, almost impossible to flip it, rides smooth and adults can even ride in it and not spill your beer. Big hit with the kiddos and adults, wish I bought sooner.
customer_reviews.author: kalon

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!  My 4 and 6 year old girls LOVED IT!
customer_reviews.text: I highly recommend this purchase. It beats the tubes of the old days which were more of a torture device. This is comfortable and safe for my young kids but also allows for more aggressive usage with adults. I towed this behind a standard inboard and do not feel like the rope raft attachment is necessary, I would try it without one before you spend the additional $100.
customer_reviews.author: Bubba

customer_reviews.title: Best Investment
customer_reviews.text: Bought this tube finally after debating over it for years. I still love to tube (i'm in my 30's) but couldn't handle how sore i would get riding on a doughnut tube. Rode on this for the first time over the 4th of July weekend and had a blast. 2 grown women and my 9 year old son rode on it at once and we were laughing the whole time. I will say make sure to put plenty of air in it or otherwise it doesn't skim across the water as nice which causes you to fall out easier! Love it and cant wait to use it again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Mable is a ton of fun!
customer_reviews.text: We tested Big Mable hard for hours a day for 4 days straight. She held up like a champ. We had to air up once. Young and old loved it. Defiantly worth the money. Update: 6 more days of HARD Big Mable use and still no issues. The canvas skin is noticeably thicker than all of the other towables I have used. The kids love this one more than any other. Mabling has become a verb in our house.
customer_reviews.author: Mikgyver

customer_reviews.title: Lots of fun. Looks better made than my previous mable
customer_reviews.text: Lots of fun. Looks better made than my previous mable. Seat and back rest are two separate chambers. Old one only had one for the whole tube. Side wall support better design. Less stress on back rest seams. Old one developed a leak on the seam where the back rest met the bottom. Could not fix it.
customer_reviews.author: Karlos

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Ride
customer_reviews.text: pulled this behind a jet ski. Great ride, easy to sit on amd enjoy the ride, not be worried about tired arms holding on for dear life. Pulled fine, even up to 45mph!! **Make sure the plugs are in All The Way. They are not threaded caps. They are tough to get in. The main plug popped out on the first ride. We spit on it and got it fully seated, no issues the eest of the weekend.
customer_reviews.author: Jackie Hack

customer_reviews.title: Big Mable is BIG FUN!
customer_reviews.text: Great fun on the lake! We could see from others on our Lake that this was a popular towable. You can ride it two ways, sitting or kneeling, however we didn’t have luck in the kneeling position as it lost air somehow. Also be aware it can flip when turning quickly. In any event, the kids had a blast. Expensive but worth it. Seems very durable.
customer_reviews.author: DDinAZ

customer_reviews.title: Our best 2 person inflatable to date
customer_reviews.text: We have had a lot of inflatables through out the 36 years living at the lake and this has to be our favorite so far. We had a family reunion at our house this year and everyone had great fun on Big Mable and she held up well. My only struggle was with the nozzles where you inflate Big Mable - they were stiff, but hopefully get easier with use.
customer_reviews.author: Trina

customer_reviews.title: Lots of fun, seems well built
customer_reviews.text: The kids love it. They haven't been able to get the kneeling and reverse towing part down, but at least forward it is a lot of fun. The sides offer support and protection for younger kids who might not be able to use other towables. With proper balancing and towing they are able to "get major air", which is what the older ones like the best.
customer_reviews.author: Joey44

customer_reviews.title: SO much fun, worth it!
customer_reviews.text: We have spent hours on Mable already and everyone loves it! Kids and Adults! We love the high back that offers neck support with the bumps. No whiplash with the tube. Great purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Niki

customer_reviews.title: It deflates
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this item the end of Feb. Waited for the weather to be nice to use it. Took it out this Easter weekend. Used it 3 times, 2 of the 3 times the backrest portion deflated while in use. I am lucky they are taking it back but with a 20% restocking fee. Buyer beware. I would not recommend this.
customer_reviews.author: cjvl

customer_reviews.title: Fun and Durable
customer_reviews.text: Our second Big Mable! Love these for tubing on the Bayou. We keep it outside all year, in NW Florida, but even at that we got about three seasons on our last Mable. Our tubers vary in age from toddlers to adults, Mable works for everyone. We did downsize this time to a two rider Mable, as the larger one was a bit heavy and we found that rarely pulled more than two riders at a time.
customer_reviews.author: Gramreader

customer_reviews.title: Looks awesome but has some sewing issues after the first 2 hours of use.
customer_reviews.text: My Big Mable has some tears in it after towing it with two children on it for about 2 hours. Not sure why this is, but I will be in contact with the seller very soon. The fake eyes are shredding, and the back tow harness straps are tearing out. I didn't pull it fast, so I'm not sure what's going on with that!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for tubing
customer_reviews.text: This is a great durable raft. Sometimes it took awhile to locate the air hole to pump and since so heavy and bulky it took some work to get the tube inside straightened out to pump. But...other thank that it’s a great raft. The kids and adults rode it hard all summer and barely any wear and tear.
customer_reviews.author: Courtenay

customer_reviews.title: This tube was not safe
customer_reviews.text: We were very disappointed in this water toy. The tube would take a nose dive at take off or during the pull. My biggest concern was you could not pull our small children do to the sinking.
customer_reviews.author: William J. Sieh

customer_reviews.title: Keeps loosing air
customer_reviews.text: The tube is great when it stays inflated but I must be doing something wrong! When we first inflated it the nozzle would end up on the bottom making it difficult to hold to put the cap on so I flipped the inner tube so the nozzle was on top. After fully inflating and putting the cap on and pushing the cap in, somehow the cap comes off while tubing. It’s a pain to have to pull back on the boat to pump back up.
customer_reviews.author: Erin E.

customer_reviews.title: Great fun
customer_reviews.text: Be aware that this does not come with a pump. We used the pump that came with a paddle board. The material is thick and durable. I like that it can be pulled from either end. My grandsons rode it once and will not give it back. We pull it behind a jet ski and have loads of fun.
customer_reviews.author: Tigerpaw

customer_reviews.title: Towable water tube
customer_reviews.text: Bought a new boat so we had to add a tube as well of course. For the money this is a good tube. It was a little hard to inflate. I had to use electrical tape to seal the hole so I could air it up. We’ve been on the lake the last three days and have used the tube the entire time. So far so good.
customer_reviews.author: egk369

customer_reviews.title: Defective!
customer_reviews.text: After using it about 8 times, the center bulged and is not useable anymore. Others have reported the same issue.
customer_reviews.author: Echo6Romeo

customer_reviews.title: Had nothing but good to say until today
customer_reviews.text: Had nothing but good to say until today. One of the inner chambers failed. Now there is a huge bump in the middle. Will still use it the rest of the season but literally only got 1 1/2 months out of it. Very disappointed!!!
customer_reviews.author: Rusty Plummer

customer_reviews.title: Slow leak :(
customer_reviews.text: How do I return this? The back rest portion deflated after the first use. Thought we'd give it another shot, and it definitely has a slow leak. The kids are super bummed because their cousins have one and love using it. I've been tubing for 15+ years, and the Big Mable is my favorite.
customer_reviews.author: Sierra

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, versatile fun!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my 8 year old who was afraid of the other tubes that literally flew into the air, along w/it's passengers. This tube is stable, but don't get me wrong - you can definately launch people out w/the right speed and waves. We've had as young as 9 months old easily moving along, to 17 yrs old looking for a wild ride - this is great fun!
customer_reviews.author: suzanbelle

customer_reviews.title: Well made tube and lots of fun
customer_reviews.text: This is my second Big mable and my kids love riding it. It is very stable and I have only flipped it twice in last 7 years. We have logged many hours on the old one before I decided to replace it with a new one,
customer_reviews.author: Ravenlincoln

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality control
customer_reviews.text: Looks like a quality control issue with ours. You are supposed to be able to tow 2 different ways however there was one one quick connect, that is not interchangeable, sewn into the strap. So the kids couldn't ride chariot style. Also the plug seemed to lose air quickly. We had to add air after each ride. The kids did enjoy it though.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: great Product
customer_reviews.text: This thing is a beast, used it many times without any issues. It’s super heavily made. I think it’ll be around a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very unhappy
customer_reviews.text: Used this tube twice and it is already beginning to rip. Not happy for the price I pay for a good quality product.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua H.

customer_reviews.title: Great Tube for the Kids
customer_reviews.text: This is a very well made tube that can be used for youth or adults. The two man tube is great for friends to sit side by side and hit the wake or waves as the tube gets airborne. Most enjoy sitting as opposed to the reverse of riding it like a chariot. Great tube and fully recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Talon Driver

customer_reviews.title: I thought wow this is going be awesome. Filled up the booster ball to go along ...
customer_reviews.text: As soon as i took the tube out of the box and put air into it. I thought wow this is going be awesome. Filled up the booster ball to go along with it. Went to hook it up and could hear a slight leak by the air valve. Made sure I had a good seal around the valve. I got it as sealed as good as I could. Still leaked. Enough that it was pretty flat 10 minutes later. Going to try to get it to seal better tomorrow. Will update later.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick Kelley

customer_reviews.title: Lots of fun,  but had  inflation/deflation problems and returned it.
customer_reviews.text: The kids had a blast on this until we took it back to shore after top portion deflated. It looks like we resolved this issue in that we may have not had the seal on tight enough. Later on the same day, we realized the bottom portion had deflated, and were unable to reinflate it after this. That said, The return was fairly easy. We will probably re-order this and try again so I’ll let you know what happens second time.
customer_reviews.author: Laura M. De Luz

customer_reviews.title: Very Good Quality
customer_reviews.text: Was a little bit of a pain finding where to inflate it and adjusting the top one so that it inflated properly but I eventually got it. All in all it's a really good. Make sure that you get some speed for it to level out. At slow speeds riders will be leaning back.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Fernandez

customer_reviews.title: tube
customer_reviews.text: Big Mable is a blast! I am a water skier but I even went on this tube, big roomy, go as fast as you want and still have fun on the water. We have doubled the people who go out with us that don't do water sports but can ride Big Mabel. I will never regret getting this tube.
customer_reviews.author: Marilyn Quinn

customer_reviews.title: Submarines Easy, Kids dont like to ride it.
customer_reviews.text: I even have the rope up on the wake tower and the nose will submarine easy. Ended up giving it away. Cant believe so many people rave about this tube... all the other tubes I have had have been better.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: What a fun towable!
customer_reviews.text: Big Mable (or Aunt Mable as my niece now calls it) is absolutely awesome! We've taken it out twice now, and everyone has had a blast on it...all the way from a 3 year old up to adults. It's easy to inflate, easy to tow, and fun to ride. It seems very durable so far. Looking forward to many more hours of fun on Mable.
customer_reviews.author: Nick Adams

customer_reviews.title: Huge disappointment!
customer_reviews.text: Don't waste your money! First time we we used this tube out the back of it punctured. The riders were adults, but not large. So disappointing! We had many others that wanted to tube, but couldn't. We used to have a Super Mable that we loved and lasted two summers before it was stolen. We wanted a tube that was smaller so we got this one.
customer_reviews.author: JORiley

customer_reviews.title: Great towable!!!
customer_reviews.text: Super easy to inflate (just two bladders) an just as easy to deflate. Bladders remove very simply (to dry out properly before packing away). Was easy to set up; does come with a quick-connect on the front side (buy a separate one for the chariot tow side). The adults and kids all had a great time and it seems built tough. the cover dried out really fast and had it packed up and stored bone dry same afternoon. Chariot style was lots of fun!!!
customer_reviews.author: Rick Murphy

customer_reviews.title: Extremely stable! Great for 6 year old to tube alone.
customer_reviews.text: We took our 6 year old child tubing on this. He rode by himself and it was extremely stable. No concerns whatsoever about him being knocked off or struggling to stay on even as we turned side to side and took him in and out of the waves. He loved it. Highly recommend this for people with younger children.
customer_reviews.author: T Snyder

customer_reviews.title: Big Mabel best constructed device
customer_reviews.text: I tried three inflatable toys before I settled on big Mabel. We may bill has a quality and safety but mostly I do not have. Plus with the coach light design it’s safer for a little kids and it’s not as hard for them to stay on the Toy
customer_reviews.author: tam

customer_reviews.title: Fabulous & durable towing raft!
customer_reviews.text: Best towable inflatable that we have ever owned! Easy to inflate. Super stable. The 2 person easily towed 3 young adults at 40 mph down the river. No tipping and no sagging. Almost impossible to turn over..
customer_reviews.author: Sandi

customer_reviews.title: Super fun young & old
customer_reviews.text: 5, 8, 10 yo boys love it. Even Grandma. Cousin girls, 8&10 visited and also loved it. Very stable, sturdy. On startup, must do relatively fast to avoid nosediving. On towing bare I kept it only 4 ft off a side cleat to avoid filling with water in wash directly behind.
customer_reviews.author: jko

customer_reviews.title: Big Mable Towable Tube ease of use
customer_reviews.text: Great product.. However, you have to be careful that the upper and lower Air Bladders do not move inside the carrier when it is deflated and stored.. Otherwise, it's all good.. And fun.. Cup holders should be included on newer versions..
customer_reviews.author: Johnny Black

customer_reviews.title: Capsized on the first use with 2 kids onboard
customer_reviews.text: The kids were so excited to go tubing on this! We were out on the Bay for less than 5 minutes before it began to sink with my 2 kids on it. Of course they had life jackets on but they were terrified. It’s obviously had a leak and it sank so fast we couldn’t recover it to send it back. $200 wasted. Never buying one again.
customer_reviews.author: Casey Spaulding

customer_reviews.title: Nice tube with a couple opportunities to improve
customer_reviews.text: Works pretty well. Two issues: 1) Keep weight back or it wants to nosedive on launch. 2) The chariot style doesn't have a Kwik connect. Just straps. Kind of annoying.
customer_reviews.author: Michael D. Hill

customer_reviews.title: Bad ass tube!!!
customer_reviews.text: I'll never own another pull tube again except THIS ONE!!!!! Just make sure your boat has enough ass to pull it. I let a friend borrow it with a lil outboard and it wasn't so "fun". But it was still fun.. I love danger and excitement. Having an inboard 302 sb I can pull 2 grown men at 65mph and this bad boy WILL NOT TIP OVER!! :)
customer_reviews.author: Adam Good

customer_reviews.title: It seems it works better with adults or older teens 16+ the 13-14 year ...
customer_reviews.text: Kids say the height of the back hits them in the neck when in wakes at higher speeds. It seems it works better with adults or older teens 16+ the 13-14 year old are the ones saying it hits them in the neck, they didn't like it.
customer_reviews.author: MJRN

customer_reviews.title: VERY stable
customer_reviews.text: Stable Mable. You will not come off this thing if the driver doesn't try. Kids love it. You can go backwards too. Kids also like to use it as an island and jump off it
customer_reviews.author: Amy Daniels

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy and a BLAST
customer_reviews.text: Well worth the money! We've spent many hours pulling not only our kids, but large adults (at one time we had two 250+ lb. guys on it at the same time) around the lake. Very sturdy and a BLAST!!
customer_reviews.author: Jan Schneider

customer_reviews.title: One of the important handles broke after 2 days
customer_reviews.text: The refund deadline is one month. We never used it until the last 2 weekends. Today being 2 August 2020. The handle broke yesterday that is needed to hold onto while operating :(for it. However Grace on chat was very helpful and since refund deadline was on 2 weeks ago is replacing it with a new one and we just need to drop off the defective one at UPS Amazon and Grace rocked it today. Thank you!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Winter Christmas Gift not useable until summer time
customer_reviews.text: Don’t know yet. Well this is a Xmas gift and our Lake is frozen so this won’t get inflated or tested u until May or June 2020. I just hope there’s no holes in the raft. I’ll provide another update / review later in 2020 once we’re able to actually use it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Well made
customer_reviews.text: I was pleasantly surprised at how easy this tube was to inflate and deflate, and how durable it seems to be. We spent the week pulling grandkids around the lake, then the adults, myself included. Lots of great memories and videos.
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: Bad manufacturing process caused weak seams
customer_reviews.text: We bought one of these last year and it lasted the entire summer. We bought a new one this year and have now gone through two of them. Both have busted at the seam on the back rest. For what we paid this is ridiculous that the seams are bad! I was able to return the first one because it was within the return window but now the replacement busted and outside of return window. Patch will not hold due to Location being on the seam.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: built tough!!!
customer_reviews.text: love this thing.....had one for 5 years then had a mishap with a truck lid. bought this one to replace it. these things are great for boating fun!
customer_reviews.author: Magic

customer_reviews.title: Kids love it
customer_reviews.text: The product is great! My kids had hours of fun. Defiantly worth the buy! Only complaint, the tube was shipped USPS and they wouldn't deliver it to our house because it was "too heavy". I would suggest it being shipped UPS or Fedex.

customer_reviews.title: Had a blast on it!

customer_reviews.title: These things are fantastic. They're huge if you've never seen one before
customer_reviews.text: Dude. These things are fantastic. They're huge if you've never seen one before! And yes. There will be times you will tip. Lean back to minimize tipping but you can never predict the waves. If youre riding the seat style, don't lean forward or kick up water. When these tubes start picking up water, you're in for it.

customer_reviews.text: I have used this tube one time and on the first pull the cap for inflating the base popped out and deflated. If you can keep it inflated it works great with 2 people.

customer_reviews.text: The tube functions just fine, the only drawback comes from the air fill ports.
